original_title: The Amazing Bible Series: The Amazing Sing Along
overview: Fill your child's heart with song! Doc Dickory and his host of friends get children up to sing and dance in The Amazing Sing Along, an interactive medley of fun. Jam-packed with musical and visual entertainment that inspires children to take a good look at the Good Book, this animated adventure is comprised of 12 favorite tunes, including "Sound the Trumpet," "Sixty-six Books," "Amazing Children," and "Water, Water." With toe-tapping songs and charming characters from The Amazing Bible Series, this collection is sure to captivate children and reawaken their interest in God's Word.
title: The Amazing Bible Series: The Amazing Sing Along
